alert.note: Alert for Hinds; Madison; Rankin; Yazoo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 10 at 10:57AM CDT until June 10 at 12:15PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Rankin County in central Mississippi... Eastern Yazoo County in central Mississippi... Hinds County in central Mississippi... Madison County in central Mississippi... * Until 1215 PM CDT. * At 1057 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Yazoo City to 6 miles north of Oak Ridge, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Benton around 1115 AM CDT. Brownsville around 1120 AM CDT. Bolton around 1125 AM CDT. Clinton, Way, Vaughan and Pocahontas around 1130 AM CDT. Sharon around 1140 AM CDT. Flowood and Richland around 1145 AM CDT. Pearl, Florence and Farmhaven around 1150 AM CDT. Brandon and Monterey around 1155 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Bentonia. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
